resources.string:
This application attempt to fix bug in the standard "Always-on VPN" feature, which present on newest versions of Android.

But since this bug is reside on firewall, to fix it you need a root access.

Remove this application if you don\'t use "Always-on VPN" feature - you don\'t need this application!

Remove this application if you don\'t have root-access for your device - application can\'t work ;\'(

More information at http://home.microlana.ru/portfolio/coding/android/java/always-on-vpn-fix.
Root access (su) is found and usable.
Root access (su) is required for this application.
Firewall control (iptables) is required for this application.
